content:
From: "Jens-D. Doll" <jd@cococo.de>
Hello Tobias, Larry and all,

it was only for the sake of "Kritik ist ein Freundschaftsdienst." that I
was telling you this little story.

Sometimes Isabelle's people seem to be far away from the real stuff and
real world.

Have a pleasant week,
Jens
